mapper.insert: insert into PLANT_COMPOSITION (ID, REGION, MONITOR_TIME, VASCULAR_FAMILY, VASCULAR_GENUS, VASCULAR_SPECIES, FERN_FAMILY, FERN_GENUS, FERN_SPECIES, GYMNOSPERM_FAMILY, GYMNOSPERM_GENUS, GYMNOSPERM_SPECIES, ANGIOSPERM_FAMILY, ANGIOSPERM_GENUS, ANGIOSPERM_SPECIES, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, REMARKS ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{region,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{monitorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{vascularFamily,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{vascularGenus,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{vascularSpecies,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{fernFamily,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{fernGenus,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{fernSpecies,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{gymnospermFamily,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{gymnospermGenus,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{gymnospermSpecies,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{angiospermFamily,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{angiospermGenus,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{angiospermSpecies,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update PLANT_COMPOSITION set REGION = #{region,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MONITOR_TIME = #{monitorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, VASCULAR_FAMILY = #{vascularFamily,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, VASCULAR_GENUS = #{vascularGenus,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, VASCULAR_SPECIES = #{vascularSpecies,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, FERN_FAMILY = #{fernFamily,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, FERN_GENUS = #{fernGenus,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, FERN_SPECIES = #{fernSpecies,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, GYMNOSPERM_FAMILY = #{gymnospermFamily,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, GYMNOSPERM_GENUS = #{gymnospermGenus,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, GYMNOSPERM_SPECIES = #{gymnospermSpecies,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, ANGIOSPERM_FAMILY = #{angiospermFamily,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, ANGIOSPERM_GENUS = #{angiospermGenus,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, ANGIOSPERM_SPECIES = #{angiospermSpecies,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, REGION, MONITOR_TIME, VASCULAR_FAMILY, VASCULAR_GENUS, VASCULAR_SPECIES, FERN_FAMILY, FERN_GENUS, FERN_SPECIES, GYMNOSPERM_FAMILY, GYMNOSPERM_GENUS, GYMNOSPERM_SPECIES, ANGIOSPERM_FAMILY, ANGIOSPERM_GENUS, ANGIOSPERM_SPECIES, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, REMARKS from PLANT_COMPOSITION where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select ID, REGION, MONITOR_TIME, VASCULAR_FAMILY, VASCULAR_GENUS, VASCULAR_SPECIES, FERN_FAMILY, FERN_GENUS, FERN_SPECIES, GYMNOSPERM_FAMILY, GYMNOSPERM_GENUS, GYMNOSPERM_SPECIES, ANGIOSPERM_FAMILY, ANGIOSPERM_GENUS, ANGIOSPERM_SPECIES, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, REMARKS from PLANT_COMPOSITION
